website_summaries.verdict: This is more of a traditional, tie-front bathrobe that is incredibly soft, offering warmth and supreme comfort.
pros: Available in a multitude of both neutral and vibrant colors
Warm and fluffy without feeling overly heavy or bulky
This robe is midi-length on most, hitting just above the ankle
Robe washes well and retains softness even after many wears and washes
cons: Some color depictions online look different than they appear in person

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'3" 115lbs and ordered small fits great! Length just right
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! I'm 5'3" 115lbs and ordered small fits great! Length just right.
customer_reviews.author: _loislane_

customer_reviews.title: Luxury robe
customer_reviews.text: This robe is absolutely amazing! I am 5’5 and about 160 lbs. I ordered the XL just to be on the safe side and I’m glad I did. I could’ve easily fit the M (according to the size chart) but the bigger the better IMO. The pics I’ve posted gives you an idea of just how big it is. This robe is nice, roomy & warm. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: A robe fit for royalty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my wife because she is always cold in the mornings and night and she absolutely loves it! Looks and feels like you could only get through a 5 star spa stay! She says that it is very comfortable and warm and also makes her feel like a millionaire! If you are looking for a robe, this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: So happy I got this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a hospital robe after brain surgery and it was absolutely perfect. Now I wear it every day when I want to cuddle up :) The picture isn't perfect, but I want to show you how long it is :)
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: "nude" and "pale mauve" are exactly the same colors
customer_reviews.text: first, I love this robe. it's warm and comfy without being bulky like some other robes. the only complaint I have is: I purchased the pale mauve months back. recently, I ordered another but in the nude color to leave at my boyfriend's house. the nude was more expensive than the pale mauve but I figured I'd pay a little more for a different color. ..BUT when the nude arrived i realized they are exactly the same color. ..just a note to anyone deciding between the two colors. ..if there is a price discrepancy when you order, go with the cheapest one bc they are definitely the same!
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: So Plush and much better than 5 star hotel bathrobes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Mauve shade. I was looking for a long bathrobe which will be soft and comfortable. Oh my Gosh!!! The softness on this robe has exceeded my expectations.. it feels so luxurious! The build quality is A class.. Would recommend this to everyone.. guys get it for the lady or girl in your life and to all ladies...get this and treat yourself!!! P.S - I am 5 feet 5 inch so you can see the length.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'4 and 8+ months pregnant (so I'm weighing ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 and 8+ months pregnant (so I'm weighing around 200 lbs right now). I ordered a size MEDIUM; fits me perfectly length and width wise considering how big I've gotten, and it is as comfy as I had hoped!! Can't wait to take this to the hospital on the big day :) My ONLY complaint is that I ordered the purple robe, and it looks a lot more pink than purple to me. But that's alright with me. The picture is just the robe hanging on my bathroom door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sizing for petite person wanting long robe. Color purple was much lighter than expected - almost PINK!
customer_reviews.text: So far a very comfortable, attractive robe in size Small. I am very happy with the sleeve length! I'm 5'3, 127lbs, and the sleeve length is not too long which is a pleasant surprise. The length of the robe hits about 1.5 inches above my ankle. Laundry instructions say: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. I haven't washed yet, hope it stays this soft. I had to take off a star because the color advertised is too inaccurate. I did not receive the rich, dark purple shown online. The robe I received is a lighter purple, almost purplish pink. I was hoping for a deeper purple.
customer_reviews.author: ItsAlwaysSunny

customer_reviews.title: So soft I feel like a teddy bear 😃
customer_reviews.text: i love this robe very soft, I want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Feels great but I have a hole in the arm sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the robe but I have a huge hole on the left arm sleeve. I really believe I should receive another one because this one was damaged. Despite the hole it is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: rachele

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute robe but EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE. Please don't ask me how I know this just consider yourself warned
customer_reviews.author: Marlana

customer_reviews.title: Used tampon applicator in pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I am LIVID! There is a used tampon applicator in the pocket of the robe I purchased!!! It is wrapped in toilet paper and sent to me. YOU HAVE TO BE KIDDING ME! I am exposed to someone’s blood in the pocket of a garment I purchased! This is beyond dangerous and a health hazard to me and my family and home!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Novak

customer_reviews.title: Pale mauve is the same color as the nude
customer_reviews.text: Soft and wonderful ankle length robe. However there is no pale mauve. I ordered nude XL for my husband and I ordered pale mauve S for me. The two robes arrived yesterday. Both exactly the same color. Size and quality is perfect but there is no pale mauve! I think they either ran out or the model photo was filtered with mauve lighting. Highly possible. Deceitful though. See my pics and order color as evidence.i won’t return as I actually love the nude color but took off a star for dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: I-Moi

customer_reviews.title: colors are falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the color that looked kind of like a dusty rose and what i received was a brownish taupe. also ordered an xl in hopes that the sleeves would be long enough for me since i’m 5’9” but they are still too short. wish i could exchange for the correct color but after reading the other reviews, i’m guessing they don’t actually make this rose color, it’s probably a photo they stole from some other brand who does make this color. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom714

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until we washed it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My daughter really needed a new robe so I was hoping this would be perfect. It is plush soft and so cozy and a beautiful blue. I washed it and it pilled so much that it filled up the lint trap on the dryer to overflowing and still had tons of pills on it after I took it out. We have not gotten rid of it, but are disappointed. The pilling is not something a seller would necessarily know, so I wrote this as a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kennel

customer_reviews.title: happily, I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luxurious robe for my mom on her 91st birthday. After looking tirelessly for a suitable robe to please all her specifications, happily, I chose this one. At 91 years old, tactile sensations are ultra sensitive. That being said, the material touching frail skin must be light and ultra soft. As soon as my mom put this robe on she exclaimed: "It's sooooo soft, I love how it feels.....and it's warm, you know how cold I get....." She loved the color "nude" as it goes with all her pajamas. The quality of the robe is remarkable thus far. No pilling after washing and it remains soft and plush Highly recommend this robe for anyone who appreciates quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't pleased with the texture of the robe when it arrived--it feels cheap--but my husband persuaded me to just keep it since we are on the road and it's hard to get a mailing address long enough to try again. So I've kept it and am glad I did--the synthetic fabric is Super warm and it is soft. I've washed it once and no visible damage that I can see. For the price, it's a fluffy and very warm snuggly cheap delight--great for cold mornings and nights. The purple color is right on as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Tristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!! Thin, sheds, hole after 1 wash.
customer_reviews.text: Updating review: 1 wash later, this robe has a hole in it. Utter crap, and I can’t return it. This robe is roomy without being oversized. However, its description of “thick” and “plush” is laughable. The fabric is rather thin and, considering how much it sheds (black fuzz everywhere!), I don’t expect it to last very long. Also, the belt loops are positioned such that it ties right under my bust, rather many inches from my waist. Ridiculous. Positives: it’s warmer than expected, and quite soft and comfortable. I’m keeping it but only because I don’t want to deal with the mall. It’s way overpriced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Nevermore

customer_reviews.title: Cute but obviously used and incredibly smelly
customer_reviews.text: Cute robe, but it reeked of cigarette smoke right out of the bag. It was obviously used before and sent back, and there weren't any tags on it. I am incredibly disappointed. I need this for use when I go into labor, and since that could happen any day, I don't have any time to return it. My only option is to wash it and hope for the best. I'm sure this was just an oversight of the company, but that doesn't make me any happier about this.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly okay
customer_reviews.text: This robe is so soft and cozy! I know I’ll be wanting to wear it every morning and night this winter. I ordered a size up but it’s a bit big so I’d say this is true to size. What’s weird is the sleeves. I’m 5”5, not the longest wingspan, and the sleeves are so short! The bagginess of the robe helps but I wish they were longer. The packaging was also horrendous- a wad of Saran Wrap and packing tape, no tag, they may as well have been shipping car parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarazahh

customer_reviews.title: SOFT & COZY!!!  Perfect for Cold Weather
customer_reviews.text: Love this Robe. I put it on most mornings after I shower as I get ready and then also at night when I'm just lounging by the TV. Its' the perfect robe for cooler weather because it's warm but not super heavy feeling on and it is long. I'm 5'4, 120 and got the Small in the Nude color and it's a perfect full length going to my calves. I've washed it numerous times and it still looks brand new. I've had a lot of other much more expensive robes and this one is WAY better. Would make a great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Corydon

customer_reviews.title: Defective item and I have to pay for returning label:(
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so much and was hoping the negative reviews would not be in my case. Unfortunately, the robe description as pale mauve is definitely not a pale pink purple-ish, instead it's light brown. I was very sad when I saw the color did not match the description at all. Secondly, the robe has a hole in the left hand pocket. The fit is definitely smaller than the usual robe. I'm 5'5, 135 pounds and normally wear size S, but wanted this one bigger, however it fits like an XS/S. Overall will be returning as it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This robe is perfect. The purple is a little lighter than the picture but gorgeous. It's perfect to snuggle in on a cold winter night and to put on in the morning while drinking a cup of tea. The color and sleeve texture makes the robe elegant. I did order a size bigger than normal because I wanted it roomy. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium as I am 5 months pregnant, I'm 5'5 and between 120 - 125 lbs. It's a little larger than I thought it would be but I wanted to make sure it was large enough to wrap around. I love how soft it feels and how cosy it is to put on in the morning. Although it's warm the material is rather thin, just to be aware in case you live in a very cold climate. It's perfect for chilly Southern California mornings. The only real downside is there are little areas of thread hanging out, I don't think this will cause damage, it just means it's not "perfect", although still highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ivyleague4

customer_reviews.title: VERY SOFT & COMFY
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest most comfortable robe I have ever worn! I bought this in nude on a whim and by all the positive reviews. Its actually tan. I did have to return the first one because the Xlarge was way to big.....could fit two of me in it. There seems to be a big difference one size up. If this is any help to anyone I wear a 14 in tops and the large fit me perfectly! Its also has pretty details on the arms and collar! Hope it washes well! A great find on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable, but reasonable quality robe and was having trouble finding one that didn't run short in the sleeves and length...or in quality. This robe is lovely, I ordered it two sizes up to be sure it would be large enough. I am 5'2 and usually an xs-s on top and medium on bottom. The sleeves run to my knuckle line and the robe falls to my ankles and I bought a large. It is very soft and fluffy and almost weightless, if you are looking for lightweight - this is definitely good. It looks very attractive and I like the taupe shade of the robe and the stippled collar and sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Very very very disappointed in the color
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the color. I order nude with hood. The pictures are false and misleading the fabric in the picture has a nice pink hue but once arrived it has 0 pink and very brown just like the “nude” I think they need to fix this and show the true color because I do not like the nude I liked the nude with the hood and they are advertised as dramatically two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Pangie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Robe
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased for me because I was dragging my electric blanket from room to room. Although I prefer a cotton robe, this is true to all the positive reviews. Nude is a great color. But I have to comment that it is not much different from the $25 ones I have seen at Walmart and TJ Maxx. Fleece is fleece. It's the same exact material, but with bigger pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra soft
customer_reviews.text: I got this robe for my wife. It shipped during the holidays and shipping was slow but I expected that. The reason I mentioned the shipping was that the seller sent me a nice gift apologizing for the delayed shipping. My wife loves both items which was a plus. She washed it upon receiving the robe and it held up to the washing perfectly. To say that this robe is soft is an understatement. I looked on the tag of her old robe and ordered the same size and this one fit perfectly as well, so I would say sizing is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Vibration

customer_reviews.title: Pale Mauve and Nude are the same.
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good. Comfort is excellent and the length is perfect. I’m 5’6”, 135 lbs and the sleeves hit right at my wrists. The bottom sweeps the top of my ankles which is great. My only real complaint is I ordered the pale mauve and as others have pointed out it’s the same as the nude color. It’s definitely brown, not anywhere close to any shade of purple or mauve. Otherwise very soft and love the fit! And the pockets are nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: SleepyKitty

customer_reviews.title: Good but has a hole
customer_reviews.text: This robe is really nice. It’s just as long as I need it to be and fits around me and my prep belly perfectly. I love the hoodie feature as well. I knocked off one star because just like in another reviewer’s comment my robe has a small hole in one of the pockets. Kind of annoying. I could just see it but I don’t know how to see and nor do I care to learn. Other than that it drops to about my ankles and I’m 5’3. I got a medium. Can’t wait to see how it fits after baby
customer_reviews.author: c.27.wade

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! I'm 4'11", about 190lbs - I'm fairly top heavy, I carry my weight in my chest and my stomach, so I am always hesitant to buy clothes online. I bought the XL just to be safe, and because I wanted it as roomy as possible, and it fits perfect. The length goes down to about 2 inches above my ankle. It wraps perfectly around my waist - not too small and not a lot of extra slack. It's so snuggly. I would definitely recommend this robe!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: So soft and thick
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. The material is SO soft and thick. It is very warm and probably only able to use during cooler months. Seems true to size but maybe consider a size up if you are in between or want to make sure it is roomy enough. It does not overlap as much as I would like but I am 8 months pregnant so it should be perfect after. I am 5 foot 4 and the long version comes down just about to my ankles. I only took off a star because there are some minor imperfections in the stitching but it is inside of the robe so does not affect how it looks or the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4" and about 138 pounds. I bought the medium and the robe is definitely too big across the shoulders and around the middle. A small would probably fit much better. I'm keeping it mostly because I'll use it only occasionally when visiting my sister (had it delivered to her house - saves packing space in the suitcase!), and I'm too lazy to return it. The robe is very soft and snuggly, like wrapping myself in a thick, soft blanket. I'm content.
customer_reviews.author: Smashed

customer_reviews.title: Comfy robe!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is perfect. Not too heavy weight wise but still warm. Plush and soft. At first I got the gray without the hood which is calf-length. It was too small so I returned it. I chose the nude color without the hood. It’s much more plush and it’s full length. For reference I am 5’4” 135lbs average build and the medium fits perfectly. Took off one star because I haven’t washed it yet and not sure how it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Robe for Price
customer_reviews.text: I agree with AlwaysSunny above. We are about the same size and ordered the same robe. Four stars due to purple being quite lighter and brighter than expected. That said, I like the robe, it appears quite well-made so far (3 weeks) and it is very warm and soft. I hope it washes well. My last fleece robe was llbean and lasted 5 years before I had to thrift if due to pilling. I doubt this one will hold up that long. But, the price was good and I may tire of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeda

customer_reviews.title: Pale Mauve Plush Robe
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. I'm 5'8" and 140lbs and bought a medium. The sleeves hit right at my wrists (not too long, not too short), and the robe length hits mid calf. The mauve color is more pale than what's pictured (on my screen), but only slightly. It's still beautiful and looks expensive. I checked all the seams and everything looks good—it's very well made. It's lighter weight than a couple of my other plush robes, which is what I wanted. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina, USA buyer

customer_reviews.title: Too small and a hole already???
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and soft, but I’m not that take and when I reach up most of my fore arm is uncovered. I’m no even that tall. This is a robe meant for short women, apparently 5’8 is too tall for an XL. EDIT: it’s two days after I made this review and I haven’t even put this robe in the washer yet. There’s a massive hole under the right arm. Went from a three star to a one star. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Just got a second.
customer_reviews.text: I live in my robe(s). I just purchased my second of this time. My first is two years old, and would still be going strong if i hasn't made the mistake and crafted while wearing it. It's still functional but won't come clean now. So it's my craft robe! So i ordered a new one. I forgot how utterly soft it is right or if the box. While it stays soft with washing, it does diminish slightly after the initial wash. Quite warm. I'm very satisfied. Original nude color, New color black. Both are full length robes.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Well-Crafted, Nice Details!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very very soft! You can also tell that’s it’s well made. The material is nice and thick. The details on the cuffs, pockets and collar are such a nice touch. I love how long the robe is. I’m 5’2 and it falls a couple of inches above my ankles. It is very warm. My only complaint is, I feel like the picture for “pale mauve” has more of a purple tint, whereas what I received looks more but beige to me. Overall, I’m still very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger for the cozy fit I wanted. It was exactly as I expected it to be. It is very well made and I love the fact that it has a good! I ordered a mauve and it is more of a beige but It is still a very flattering color. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: COZY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So don’t fancy robes much but need one for going to the hospital for an intensive surgery. I normally would go to Nordstrom but I’m short on time and ordered this. It is low in price so really didn’t it to be all that great but the reviews were good so figured I’d try it. After all, I could always send it back if it was terrible. - This is yummiest, coziest robe I could have asked for!!!! Normally don’t write reviews but want to help anyone on the fence. It’s comparable to the $150 quality ones I’ve seen. Cozy! Cozy! Cozy!!! I’m a size 8/10, 5’5 and the medium is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not the size I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I just got this robe delivered and I can always give a review in the future, but for now I can say that this robe is really soft and warm. It is not as long as I had hoped. It's still a good 2" too short. (I am 5'4") I bought the size X-Lg in hopes that it would be longer. I was surprised that this robe is not as big as I expected. If I was 200 Lbs, it would be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA E.

customer_reviews.title: Best bathrobe I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: SO AMAZING! Seriously, this is my first review even tho I’ve been ordering from amazon for over a year now but I just had to leave one because it is THAT GOOD! I’m 5’2 and between 115-125 lbs ( weight fluctuates a lot) and I got a small. This feels like a luxury item that one would easily pay upwards for 100$ for. Got the charcoal with the hood in size s. It’s perfectly plushy, hits right at my ankles, hood is big like I like it, and while I haven’t washed it yet it feels like the “ plushness” won’t get matted or messed up once it’s washed. If you are considering, deff do it!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Best robe i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between wanting to buy this and not wanting to spend the money and I am SO glad I made the plunge. It is so, so, so soft. I went a size up so I could wear it as like a blanket on the couch and I basically never take it off. If you're on the edge, go ahead and purchase because it's amazing. I don't even want to wash it because then I won't have it for an hour or so and that makes me sad.
customer_reviews.author: K. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: GO FOR IT
customer_reviews.text: I searched on Amazon for about two hours for a robe (LOL). I am the type of person who really believes in reviews. I came across this robe and was still hesitant BUT I am so happy with it! It's super soft and great quality; meaning it doesn't feel thin and there are no fuzzies.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best bathrobe EVER!!!  SUPER soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best robe I've ever had! It is super soft!!!! Did I say soft? I meant SUPER SOFT!!! I can live in it! The belt length is perfect. The sleeves fold up to keep them out of the way for cooking and doing dishes. No more soaked sleeves. I haven't washed it yet but I will do so on the gentle cycle and heat as other people have suggested so that it remains really soft. I ordered the tan and it matched perfectly to the picture on the website. Highly recommend it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: The overall fit of this robe is perfect, all except for the sleeves. They only go down to about my elbow on the left arm and half way down my forearm on the right arm... I am not a long or mismatched armed person, but according to the sizing of this robe, I guess I am now. I'm 5'6" - 145lb and I ordered a small. It fits everywhere else, just not the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bathrobe but questionable warmth
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style and color of this robe, and it was very soft. However, I'm returning it since I was quite disappointed with the thickness. It feels more lightweight than I was expecting and definitely wouldn't keep me very warm in the winter. I'm always cold and have been borrowing my husband's plush Old Navy bathrobe, which I guess I'll have to keep borrowing until I find something like it. I've been looking for a nice, thick, heavy robe and sadly this wasn't it.
customer_reviews.author: petitchatonTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I got the mauve w hood, I love the color and it is so soft. Washed fine. Deducting a star bc the internal tie that keeps it closed ripped right off when I tied it for the first time. I don’t sew so it’s just a function I won’t be able to use which sucks. Will still wear, it’s very cozy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gilzean

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size or two!
customer_reviews.text: SO soft and cozy. Perfect for cuddling up on a cold day! I first ordered a medium (which is my normal size- I'm 5'5" and 130lb for reference), and it fit okay...but I like robes to be big and cozy, so I exchanged for an XL (pic is of the XL). Glad I did. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Pilled & fell apart!!
customer_reviews.text: Threw it away! I always wash something before wearing. It pilled and had clumps and clumps of fuzz balls all over. Not wearable. So disappointed. Washed and rewashed hoping some of The pilling would go away. Looked horrendous. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy

customer_reviews.title: This robe runs on the small side and is not ...
customer_reviews.text: This robe runs on the small side and is not as warm or plush as described or pictured. I have long arms and the sleeves are really too short. I ordered a medium which usually gives me long enough sleeves since I wear a small in clothing, although I'm sort of on the tall side, not really, 5' 9", but I needed to get a large, then again, it would have probably been to long, I really don't know. It's also pink, not purple.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful purchase! I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this item, it is very plush and worth every penny I paid for it, I'm very sorry so ours super long, it does come to my ankles instead of my knee, but that's alright, it just makes me feel more covered when I wear it, plus I can shorten it if I really want to. It also was delivered a day earlier than they thought it would get to me, so I'm very happy with this purchase. Thank you, Richie House and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: needs some work
customer_reviews.text: as many reviews stated this is a VERY soft robe. which I wanted, the big problem is the loop for the tie is place right at the chest area... i am literally having to tie the robe underneath my boobs. in the picture you can see my hand is placed at my waist, that is where it should tie, not confortable or cute. this is a size small for reference i am 5'4" 130. over all the fit of the robe is very nice. sad but will be returning it. the search continues
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Flores

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, there are higher quality robes out there for ...
customer_reviews.text: This robe is poorly made. It arrived with one of the inside ties nearly torn off and a hole in the pocket. Within a week of trying out this robe, the corner of one of the pockets ripped completely off. I am very gentle with my clothing so this is clearly a quality issue. Would not recommend, there are higher quality robes out there for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear in the hospital when I go to deliver my baby anytime now. I wear small/medium in maternity at 36 weeks. It’s super soft & cuddly, the color is lovely; just know it’s more pinkish purple—almost magenta. It’s warm, but not heavy. My only complaint is that the arms are short (what I would expect for an xsmall or small) and the right sleeve is about an inch shorter than the left one. Nevertheless, I’d like to get one for ladies in my family because it’s otherwise wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: G Team

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a year since I got this robe and it's as soft as ever. Great fit, great length. Just a solid product overall. If it weren't for the slightly stained edges of the sleeves upon arrival I would have given this five stars. It isn't super noticeable, but blemishes are blemishes and I must subtract points for them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This robe fits great, but is apparently not well made. I washed and dried it ONCE, just put it on this morning for the FIRST TIME, and realized one sleeve cuff is ripped almost the whole way around my wrist! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy. But maybe go one size up.
customer_reviews.text: Very plush and soft. Love the hood. Helps when my hair is wet. This robe also dries very quickly on its own. That's a plus. I maybe wish I'd gone a size up. I can wrap it around myself fully without issue when I standing and it looks and feels like it fits fine, but when I bend over or sit it feels like there's suddenly a lot less material. So I feel I have to be a bit careful not to inadvertantly flash anybody. Other than that, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slide on easily when you are wet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathrobe for my girlfriend. It is a very nice looking robe and it will dry you off good but my only gripe is that it can be tough for my girlfriend to put on after taking shower because it doesnt slide over the skin very easily when its wet. It’s almost like it tries to stick as you are trying to slide into it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Ward

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: I love the robe. It is longer in length. I am 5'4" and it ends a few inches above my ankle. The sleeve length is acceptable as it goes down half my hand but the cuff can be rolled up if need be. I do like the strings inside the robe to help keep it shut. The only thing I don't like is I washed it and it still leaves fine fuzzy material on me or my bed. I'm thinking that with more washings it will decrease.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Super Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This robe is so soft... so cozy..... soooo (sigh....) soooo...(yawn.....)....amazzinzzggnwoniegsa So cozy I just fell asleep a little while typing this. I better take the robe off If I'm going to review other products.
customer_reviews.author: Neightn

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in yo life.
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe, it’s the snuggliest thing I own, color is amazing, it’s roomy and comfortable, my husband enjoys wearing this when I’m not around (caught him twice) it’s worth every single penny. I will grow old with this robe, fo sho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe so much, super cozy/long/hood is great
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy robe ever. Love how soft & fuzzy it is. Super cozy, love the fact that it has a hood (a good sized one that actually covers your whole head well) & 2 pockets on the front. Its loose fitting, but its how i like my robes to fit. Definitely longer than i had expected, but i actually like that a lot. Its almost all the way to the floor/my feet. It ends right at my ankle/right above my ankle, which just makes it feel even cozier cause it covers your whole body.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wish the purpose od being in the hospital for surgery, and wanted to have something comfy and warm to wear. I love it, and so did everyone else at the hospital!! I got more,compliments on this, it was great!! Every one wanted to touch it to feel how soft it was!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and plush
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today but so far I love it! Very soft, nice detailing as pictured (I got the nude/mocha color). I am 5'4" about 135lb. with a 38" bust and the Medium fits perfectly, not sloppy big but plenty to wrap around. Length is below mid calf but not quite to my ankles (I have short legs though) Also love the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE A PARR

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite as Pictured, But Still a Nice Robe for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I am returning it, but overall it is a decent robe and a very decent price. I ordered the dark gray - the picture showed short, which I didn't want - but the description said long. What I got was long, which is good, but it has a hood, which none of the pictures show (in any color) and I didn't want. Hence why I returned it. There are so many similar styles - it is always a gamble what you get when ordering this way.
customer_reviews.author: TJF

customer_reviews.title: Soft And Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, very soft robe. I ordered a Large because I like to really wrap myself in softness during the cold months. I am 5 feet, 5 inches, and the Large size is just right for me. I would not say this is a true purple color. It is more a very deep rose with a touch of purple in it. Not the color you see in the photo. However, it is lovely and a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: zesty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and great item!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this robe, it’s so soft and comfy. I could wear it all day, it covers you when wearing pajamas etc and keeps you looking modest and pretty. It keeps you warm and cozy. I wish I had 2! :) Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: So comforterble , but may be too long for some peopel
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable robe a have ever worn. I absolutely love it but if I was a bit shorter it would probably drag on the ground. The description should state how long this robe is , other than that , i really enjoy it. By the way I am 5'5 and 145lb and this robe fits just below my calfs which is ok in when you live in a cold state.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, neat fuzzy fabric, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Full length on 5’8” woman. Warm, cozy, good looking. Got many compliments in hospital from staff, nurses, and visitors. Was asked where I got it and one nurse looked for the label (maker)! A few surprised could get from Amazon! Think they’ll look for it! LOVE this classy, well-made, comfy robe!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brophy Wall

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cozy but it is rather long, im 5’6 and I do tend to step on it going up the stairs. It has big pockets which is a plus since I always keep things in there. Also the tie is a little to high I would have liked it having the 2 different loops so you can choose how high you want it tied. But overall I am still happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after she let me know that she was cold in the evening. It came down to either getting her a warm robe or turning the furnace way up. I went for choice #1 and she loves her new robe. It runs true to size and she loves the feel, the comfort and (most of all) how warm it is. And, the price is very reasonable for this quality robe.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a medium (i usually wear a M /8) so i figured this would fit fine - the armpits are a little snug and the sleeves are a little short - i should have ordered a L (i’m 5’7” & 160ish for reference) it also shed all over me when i first wore it hopefully after a wash the shedding fuzzies will go away it’s very comfortable and very long! i also love that it has pockets!
customer_reviews.author: MandaVK

customer_reviews.title: You will love this robe
customer_reviews.text: I picked the light purple, and it is more of a dark mauve, but that is the only complaint I have. It is unbelievably soft and warm, and yet not too fluffy. I feel like I'm in Heaven when I put it on. I'm 5'3" and the Large comes about 3" above my ankles, which keeps my legs nice and warm. It also has plenty of room in case I gain my usual 20 lbs of winter weight!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my always-cold girlfriend. One of the main reasons I picked it is because it came in a small instead of just a small/medium. She's 5'0" and under 100 lbs and this goes about to her ankles which is fine for around the house! She likes how soft the fabric is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: So confortable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7, 145lbs athletic built and a medium fits prefect! The length come right below my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey houchens

customer_reviews.title: LUXURY
customer_reviews.text: This robe is fabulous! It is the softest robe I have ever worn. It's so plush and warm. I love it so much I will most likely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brown

customer_reviews.title: Favorite robe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, comfortable robe. It’s very light weight but warm and cozy. It looked pretty bad when I first unwrapped the package (compressed and wrinkled) but it fit, so I decided to throw it in the wash and keep it. It came out of the dryer looking fluffy and fresh. I’ve washed it several times since than and it always looks brand new -with no shrinkage or fraying. I’m 5’2” and weigh 125 lb. I bought the medium and I’m happy with it because I like a big snuggly fit.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Love the softness of this robe, but the inside ribbon tie ripped out.
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of this robe and the length, however on the second day that I used it, the inside ribbon tie ripped right out of the robe. I use this to keep the robe securely closed because it is a little big on me. So, it looks like I will have to sew it back in. It's not worth returning and getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark pink color. Just beautiful. Incredibly soft, warm, comfortable. I really love it. The belt slides out of the loops really easy so every time you put it on, you need to find the belt and/or feel around for the end and rethread it through. The belt loops would benefit from being smaller. Highly recommend. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color Description is Off on Dark Purple
customer_reviews.text: The Robe came quickly and seems to be nice. My wife says it fits well and is quite cozy and comfy. It is plush and soft. The big issue is with the color. I know that color is often subjective, but we ordered a "Dark Purple" and it is NOT Dark Purple. In the options there was a "Purple" and a "Dark Purple." I ordered the DP, but it is quite light and bright. We all agree that is more of a fuchsia or magenta color. So be aware when picking your color!
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in the robe I received. I am pregnant with our 2nd child and wanted something nice for the hospital. My husband ordered the mauve with the hood. While the color matches the color on the listing, it’s not a plush robe by any means. I can feel the sewing on the inside seams when I wear it so that is a big bummer. The sleeves run a little short as well. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red One Sheds Way Too Much
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this robe but the shedding is just too much; even after a couple of washes it was still happening. After only a half hour of wearing it my clothes were completely covered in red fuzz. Also, if you're a tall person like myself (5'10") with long arms you may want to skip on this robe as the sleeves are very short. This robe is definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother in law who lives in the UK. It’s super soft, and a nice light shade of pink. Super fluffy. She’s only 5’2” and the robe reaches to the floor but not enough to trip over. We paired this nice robe with a pair of pink soft fluffy slippers so she’s all set for winter
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Sinclaire

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is the absolute best! The fabric is super soft and plush, super warm. It fit as expected and the color was true to the picture online. It was a little more than I wanted to spend but definitely worth it since it’s well made. It makes a great housecoat!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Y.

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Super soft, pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: Soft soft soft. Plan to eventually wash carefully on cold as I hope to retain the current feel. Great color. Nice length (I am 5'9") looking forward to Fall and Winter just so I can enjoy wearing this robe. Wide enough to wrap well. Nice strong loops for sash. Well stitched. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Droessler

customer_reviews.title: So soft & so warm!
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded description! Detail is very nice, soft and warm...an understatement! I belice in "understate & over deliver"...here it us & that's rare! Washed perfectly with no shrinkage. Actually, i could have used some shrinkage but im thrilled. I could have ordered a size smaller but i do like an oversized feel in a robe like this, so decided to not exchange. Ordering "true size" is appropriate. This is 5☆ all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Jan

customer_reviews.title: Look no further; this is the perfect robe!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this robe! I wear my robe for 70 percent of my day because I am always cold. I was worried about getting a robe that wouldn’t be too hot and I could swear it during the summer. It fits great and it’s thin enough to wear in June. The arms are just the right length. I’m 5’2 and 130 pounds. I got a small.
customer_reviews.author: wanda s.

customer_reviews.title: Soooo warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing robes at home, especially in the colder weather, and this one is so great at insulating heat! It's plush, cozy, and very cute too. I'm a small person so I've been using this as a snuggie-type blanket at night too- I was really feeling the heat stay trapped under the robe! So great for winter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: iJone

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soft robe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mauve and it came in kind of a fleshy color, not quite pink and not quite Gray. I have to admit not my favorite color but I didn't care for the others offered. As far as comfort this thing is amazing. Soft, with an inside tie and an outside belt, it is well made and has held up to washing so far without disintegrating into the lint trap. I would buy this again or for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: just love the feel of it
customer_reviews.text: Too large but probably my fault. Plenty of room so I would say it may run a bit large. The material is luxurious, just love the feel of it. Color is very pretty. I did not return it as it felt so good and you don't need one to fit exactly anyway. Would really recomment to anyone to buy,
customer_reviews.author: karaokelady

customer_reviews.title: Oversized, warm, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear this daily. It's oversized, warm, and comfy. I'm 5'6 and it is just above my ankles so good full length coverage. 4 stars only because one of the inner ties was coming undone at the seam but that was an easy sew. All other seams are well sewn, sturdy. Also, after the 1st wash the sleeves had a lot of leftover lint. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TheFCC

customer_reviews.title: Softest robe ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t give many things 5 stars but this robe definitely deserves all 5! It’s so soft and very warm. I’m 4’11” so I was worried it would be dragging on the floor but it fell just at my ankles, so it was perfect. The color was beautiful as well. Even my kids love it and they often take it when I’m not looking. I wish they made kids sizes, because I would totally buy those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not the color or size i ordered?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large because I wanted a giant robe and I got it in dark purple, which looks like a light wine color in the picture. The robe I got was PINK, maybe a pink purple, but certianly not dark purple and it fit me. I'm 5'5" and a bit chubby but from what I was reading, a Medium was fitting ladies a few inches taller. I ordered an extra large and the sleeves fit and it came up to an inch or so below my knees. I returned it and that went well.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Gouvea

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Soft Pretty Robe!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this robe! I had another robe for 20 years. Just busy with 3 kids and never saw one I liked when I had the time to look. I started searching for a new one about a year ago. This is exactly what I have been looking for. It's SUPER soft. It is very warm; I can't wait to put it on. The color is a lovely soft mauve. I like that the collar and cuffs have a pattern on them. I'm just under 5'8" and about 130 lbs. I ordered the small, and it's perfect for me. I'm extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Feels like hugging a rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable robe I've ever own and I'm a "mature" woman. The softness doesn't end with a wash. I wash, dry, and it still feels like I want to wrap myself in it like a cocoon. Was sorry had to hang it up for the summer but our temps and its warmth just didn't match. Will look forward to fall/winter to use it again. The color is beautiful. Didn't mind going into the kitchen when house guests were present.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Thick, comfy robe keeps Mom warm
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mother is cold all the time, so I bought her this robe. The fabric is very soft and thick, and keeps her much warmer than the robe she was wearing previously. It fits her well, and I think she'd be happy to wear it all day. I'd definitely buy it again, and am glad to recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernbelleV

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side, even for a small-boned woman - it’s a little tight under the arms. Otherwise the length and waist fists great. Warm but not too warm and it’s made of synthetic fibers. Deep front pockets nice bright red.
customer_reviews.author: DCmom

product_meta.title: Richie House Women's Plush Soft Warm Fleece Bathrobe Robe RH1591
feature_bullets: A self-belt cinches the waist of this cozy shawl-collar robe by Casual Moments
Improved manufacturing process yields stronger fabric and superior stitching.
